system.note: PEN Only applies to Primitive Armours. Any Injured by this weapon must make a +0 Toughness Test or suffer 1 Fatigue. Requires a +0 Medicae Test to remove it stuck in, failiure causes 1d5 damage that ignores armour and toughness.

description.value:
Special: Primitive (8), Snare

Note: PEN Only applies to Primitive Armours. Any Injured by this weapon must make a +0 Toughness Test or suffer 1 Fatigue. Requires a +0 Medicae Test to remove it stuck in, failiure causes 1d5 damage that ignores armour and toughness.
